description: More breathable and moisture-wicking than the original, the Houdini Air Jacket is your best friend for longer missions when a little weather resistance is crucial. The ultralight fabric is treated with DWR to shed light rain, and a tight weave blocks wind and withstands abrasions. The fabric backing is lightly textured to help you avoid getting clammy during high-output adventures. The cuffs and hem are designed with minimal trim to be lightweight with low bulk. And the chest pocket doubles as a stuff sack for convenient carrying, with a reinforced carabiner loop so it can be clipped to your harness or pack.Lightweight nylon (51% recycled) and polyester fabric has a textured backing for increased airflow against the skin.DWR finish adds weather protection.Low-profile hood with drawcord lets you fine-tune fit while maintaining peripheral vision.Zippered chest pocket converts to a stuff sack for easy storage. Includes a reinforced loop for securing to your harness or pack.Reflective details keep you visible.Slim fit accommodates a base layer or mid-layer.
name: Patagonia Houdini Air Jacket - Men's
